data.title: Model live-tweets married actor Brian Presley’s chat-up lines
data.meta_description: A New York model has embarrassed a married American actor by taking to Twitter to live-tweet his drunken attempts to woo her on a domestic flight.
data.text:
A New York model has embarrassed a married American actor by taking to Twitter to live-tweet his drunken attempts to woo her on a domestic flight.

Brian Presley, known best across the pond for his role on TV’s ‘General Hospital’ as well as a number of smaller films like 'Home of the Brave' and 'Boarderland' allegedly described his encounter with model Melissa Stetten as “divine interception”.

[Related story: Samuel L Jackson's Twitter fury over bad 'Avengers' review]

[Related story: Spike Lee apologises for Twitter mistake]

The 22-year-old model tweeted to her nearly 25,000 strong following: “Brian has a wedding ring. I ask him how his wife is, he says he just wears the ring because he likes it. Right, Brian.”

34-year-old actor Presley has been married for ten years and has two children with wife Erin Hershey Presley. When Stetton was told this she replied: “He said he was engaged for 6 months but broke it off!”

Later during the flight she said: “Brian came back from the bathroom WITHOUT his wedding ring on! Watch out, Virgin America, you’ve got a real charmer on board.”

Presley took to his Facebook page to deny Stetton’s (who didn’t know who he was initially) claims, saying: “I learned today this person has been tweeting about me drinking beer in the airplane bathroom, and trying to commit adultery with her on the airplane. Really absurd and quite funny!”

“Sobriety, God, & My Family are the most important things in my life! My Wife Rocks, My Kids Rock, and Sobriety Rocks!!! I will pay this no more attention and I encourage all of you to do the same. God Bless all of you and thank you all for all your support,” he said to his 1,700 Facebook fans.
